data.name: Treasures Editor
data.detailed_description:
Treasure Editor:
Added the function of ‘custom treasure’, which can support to distribute the created treasures to corresponding force through player’s willing.
The properties of treasure can be able to edit.

It can be able to allot treasures to corresponding force when load in the new game.

The adjustment about treasures properties can be available in the game process.
data.about_the_game:
Treasure Editor:
Added the function of ‘custom treasure’, which can support to distribute the created treasures to corresponding force through player’s willing.
The properties of treasure can be able to edit.

It can be able to allot treasures to corresponding force when load in the new game.

The adjustment about treasures properties can be available in the game process.
data.short_description: Treasure Editor: Added the function of ‘custom treasure’, which can support to distribute the created treasures to corresponding force through player’s willing.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14.4
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
